overview: Live Blu-ray features footage of the biggest anime song live performance "Animelo Summer Live 2008 -Challenge-" on August 30, 2008 at Saitama Super Arena on two discs. Stars Akino from Minori Chihara, ALI PROJECT, Masami Okui, AAA, GRANRODEO, Yoko Ishida, Yukari Tamura, Karen Girl's, Nana Mizuki, and plenty more!
title: Animelo Summer Live 2008 -Challenge- 8.30
